    Function reference

    All functions

    abbreviate_by_column()
    Replace Column Values with Shorter Version
    abbreviate_lookup()
    Abbreviate a column of a lookup table
    add_legend_to_categorical_raster()
    Add legend to categorical raster
    assign_time_period()
    Assign a time period to a SpatRaster object
    calc_lc_freq()
    Calculate land cover frequency for multiple raster layers
    calc_res_conv_factor_to_ha()
    Calculate Resolution Conversion Factor To Hectares
    calc_top_lcc()
    Get the top n rows of the input data frame
    calc_trajectory_map()
    Calculate Trajectory Map
    color_forest_trajectories()
    Create a Color Lookup Table for Forest Definitions
    color_landuse_trajectories()
    Create a Color Lookup Table for Trajectory Categories
    create_crosstab()
    Create Crosstab From Raster List
    create_lut_reclass()
    Create lookup table for land cover trajectories
    create_sankey()
    Create a Sankey Diagram
    create_traj_lookup()
    Create lookup table for land cover change trajectories
    driluc_traj_lookup
    Lookup Table for Major Land Use Types
    generate_combinations()
    Generate Combinations of Trajectory IDs
    ggplot_to_image()
    Save ggplot2 plot as an Image Object
    harmonise_raster()
    Crop and harmonise predictors, such as climate and soil data
    lcc_summary_by_pu()
    Summarize land cover changes by planning unit
    lcc_trajectory_by_pu()
    Land Cover Change Trajectory by Planning Unit
    lc_lookup_klhk
    Land cover data of East Nusa Tenggara of 2020
    lc_lookup_klhk_sequence
    Reclassified Land Cover Lookup Table from the Indonesian Ministry of Environment and Forestry (KLHK)
    lookup_trajectory_complete
    Lookup Table for Land Cover Change Trajectories
    lookup_traj_reclass
    PreQUES Land Use Change Analysis Report
    LUMENSR_example()
    Get path to LUMENSR example
    lut_trajectory
    Lookup Table for Land Cover Trajectories
    ntt_admin
    Historical Temperature data for East Nusa Tenggara
    ntt_admin_lookup
    District boundaries of East Nusa Tenggara in spatraster format
    plot_bar_trajectory()
    Plot a Bar Chart of Trajectories
    plot_categorical_raster()
    Plots a categorical raster map
    plot_lcc_freq_bar()
    Plot Frequency or Area of Land Cover Change as a Bar Chart
    plot_lc_freq()
    Land Cover Frequency Plot
    plot_planning_unit()
    Create a plot of a spatial planning unit with labels.
    prepare_sankey()
    Prepare data for creating a Sankey plot with multiple transitions
    print_frequency_table()
    Prints a frequency table as an HTML table using the gt package
    ques_pre()
    Pre-QUES Land cover change analysis
    ques_pre_trajectory()
    Calculate land use and land cover change trajectory
    rasterise_multipolygon()
    Rasterize an sf MULTIPOLYGON object
    reclass_raster_to_categories()
    Reclassify a Raster to Categories
    vis_map_temperature()
    Visualize Temperature Map
    write_rasters_to_adir()
    Write SpatRaster Objects to a Directory
